With a THUD Jim landed in a dark cavern like pit. It smelled of leather and a funky sweaty smell. As he looked up to the light he saw something. It looked like a giant tag of some sort. He focused in on it and what he saw ran a shiver down his spine.

Texas Steer
Size 13Wide

He knew immediately where he ended up. Inside Brad, his oldest sons work boot. While not being particularly worried right away, thinking he would be able to find his way out, he then remembered, it was Wednesday, lawn mowing day. He was also able to see thru the shaft of the boot, the clock on the wall. 5:25pm. Brad would be home any minute.

Just then everything got worse.

The front door opened and Jim saw the huge vision of his son home from work. Brad worked as a troubled youth counselor. He was 6’3, 230lbs. and very intimidating. That’s what made him so good at his job.

All Jim knew was that he had to find a way out of that boot before Brad changed out of his work clothes and came back down stairs. The walls of the boot were too flat to get a grip. He thought about pulling the tongue of the boot down and crawling thru the laces but Brad would weave the tongue into the laces to keep it from shifting while worn.

He tried to jump up and catch a string hanging down. He caught it on his 3rd jump. Jim began shimmying up the string. About ½ way up he heard the pounding footsteps of his son coming down the steps.

“Damn, I forgot socks” he heard him say to himself aloud. “Oh well” and then the boots were picked up off the floor.

Jim swung from side to side hitting into the leather side of the boot. Brad sat down on a chair and dropped the boots.

PLUNK

Jim lost his grip and fell again to the insole. Gathering his wits about him he looked up just as Brad was going to put his huge bare foot into the boot.

1432.content:
Tommy stood up and stretched his arms, then wiggled his toes, enjoying the feeling between them. He realized now that he was just alone; his regard for his father was gone, he was now an object. At first, Tommy wasn't sure what to do. He could feel his father in his shoe, pounding for freedom, but it was more of an itch than anything. Seeking to silence it, he decided to go shoot some hoops.

* * *

Jim felt as though he was on a sort of swampy trampoline. The spongey surface under him was inundated with sweat and it oozed up in frothy bubbles when he took steps on it. Not that there was a lot of room to walk with the room taken up by Tommy's toes. He was somewhat tangled up in between two of them, but he could pull himself away, into the tiny corner. He felt as if he were in a dark, smelly closet with a slanting room.

Tommy wasn't a bad kid, he though. And while not excusing his actions, Jim understood the reasons behind it. After getting divorced from the boys' mother, all the boys had been cold towards him at first. Gradually, they had formed a functionable household, but there were still fights often. Jim felt as if he were in a constant power struggle with the boys. The younger ones were the worst, because Trevor and Mike would do whatever Tommy told them. Brad could care less about his youngest brothers; Tommy was the only one he got along with. The age gap was too great with the others.

He had come to realize in time that Tommy had become something of a boss in the household. He was young enough to influence his younger brothers, who admired him and his athletic ability, but still old enough to communicate with his older brother, who envied his brain (Tommy was an honors student). Brad was now at a community college.

So making chances always needed Tommy's rubber stamp and Jim had always found himself being less lenient with the middle child. Tommy didn't return the favor, often alienating his dad. He also had a bad temper, expressing his feelings physically and sometimes even fighting with his dad. He had done this even when he was younger, but Jim could always handle the youngster. Now, he was reluctant to admit that he often bruised when he wrestled with Tommy.

Before he could philosophize any longer, he was suddenly thrown across the cavern of the shoe, striking the rubbery wall. His darkened world was shaking up and down.

* * *

Tommy dribbled up the driveway, running his own commentary. "Tommy runs up the court, avoids a point guard" -- he made a sweeping motion, ducking around an imaginary player -- "he's at the line, he shoots, he scores!" The ball confidently dropped through the net and Tommy let it bounce into the ground. Someone was pulling into the driveway.

15.content:
Jim tried to be a good father to his four sons. Setting a good example always remained foremost in his mind. To his credit, he hadn't done anything as irresponsible as getting totally drunk in years.

But he felt as if he were suffering from the worst hangover imaginable as he slowly regained consciousness in Mike's room.

He rubbed his eyes and groaned. He opened his eyes and everything snapped into focus.

"What the—" Jim said.

He stared up at his son's colossal bed, bigger than a city block and as tall as a skyscraper.

As he tried to conceive of what had happened to him, he got a ripe whiff of a terrible odor. He looked a short distance toward the sock, the same dirty sock he had picked up in the hallway. His 13-year-old son's dirty sock smelled awful, and Jim started moving away to escape the odor.

That's when he noticed the device, resting on its side and slightly beneath Mike's bed. He began running toward the building-sized invention. The closer he got, the more the hand-held unit dwarfed the shrunken man. Its knobs, buttons and other moving parts were now far too large for him to manipulate.

"I'm not even an inch tall!" The tiny man shrieked in mounting horror. "What am I going to do? Mike! Tommy! Boys! Somebody! Help!"
15.title: Under an Inch

151.content:
A couple hours passed as Jim paced around the middle of his sons room, waiting for his return. He figured his best chance, even at his micro size, would be standing out in the open for his son to see.

The he heard a couple loud thuds off in the distance, possibly outside, like car doors. Immediately followed by muffled talking. Jim's heart began to race as his adrenaline kicked in from anticipation. He can only hope that he will be seen. He recognizes the sound of the front door opening, instantly the sound becomes much louder and echoed. He can hear the voices of all 4 of his sons.

The boys disperse throughout the house, Mike heads to his room.

" Hey Dad!" Jim hears Tommy call out. " Are you here?"

Mike enters his doorway but stops. Jim's heart is pounding as he sees the now colossal size of his son.

" I thought we were all supposed to hang out tonight?" Mike said aloud.

" It's not the first time he's forgotten, he's probably out with friends from work." Tommy replied.

Mike closed his door to get ready for the night.

Jim watched as his son closed the door and too a few steps in, throwing his backpack on his bed. All of his movements seem to almost be in slow motion at his titanic size.

"I'M DOWN HERE! MIKE LOOK DOWN HERE!" Jim screamed at the top of his lungs; his heart sank when he realized his son couldn't hear him. He is nothing more than a speck in this titans world now.

Mike continued moving forward, his deafening steps drawing closer to his father. The ground shook with each step, causing Jim to fall to the ground. Mike stopped right above his father, both feet planted on either side. Jim looked up, his glance following his sons smooth legs up to his shorts. Jim could see Mikes boxers, his sons face was blocked out by his crotch. Only getting a glimpse of his chin.

Mikes gaze fell to the ground, Jim thought he was looking at him until he slowly began to reach down and grab his socks pulling each off. His bare feet take their place on each side of Jim again. His sons gaze was still looking down, Jim watched in horror as Mikes hands reached for his pants. The pants slowly begin to slip, falling to the ground around Mikes ankles.

Jim was covered in the giant garment, but only briefly as Mike picked them up and threw them in his dirty laundry.

' I have to get his attention somehow, I need to at least try." Jim spoke to himself.

Jim began to run towards his sons feet, he started to pound his fists on his sons flesh, yelling up at him. Mike began to take off his shirt as well. Meanwhile Jim started scaling the side of his sons foot, realizing it was a bad idea as Mike started walking.

Mike walked over to his dresser to grab his pajamas, unknowingly giving his father a ride.

The world sped by quickly for Jim with each of Mike's steps, but ended almost as soon as it started. " Alright" Jim said looking up at his son. " Let's see if this works."

Jim opened his mouth and took a bite right into Mike's flesh.

Mike felt the smallest of pinches on the inside of his foot, he casually brought the foot up and scratched it. He began to think about which pajama shirt he wanted to wear as he casually rubbed his chin.

Jim bit hard, and his world lifted with a jolt. He looked up, and saw Mike's hand reaching down for him. The redwood sized fingers surrounded Jim, and began to move side to side. The gigantic thumb of his son rolled over him, pinning him to the foot as his son rubbed him into it. The pressure was soon released as he was pulled away from the foot, and not stuck to his son's thumb. Jim rose as he watched his sons body sink, he was met with Mike's giant mouth as he slowly drew closer to it, making contact with his bottom lip. He was rubbed into the soft red flesh, as his son was thinking. All Jim could think about was how close he is to his son, and still his son has no idea.

Mike's mouth opened slightly, giving Jim a glimpse inside the massive cave. Jim could hear his sons light breathing; just enough light entered to illuminate the wet cavern. He saw the massive pink snake of a tongue gently twitch before the mouth shut and he was pulled away.

Mike reached for his pajamas, put them on and headed downstairs.

Jim was lowered to the dresser, pressed into a soft fabric and then lifted into the air as Mike put on his shirt. He lowered again, pressing into another fabric and his vision was complete darkness. Light flooded his eyes as he saw Mike pulling on his pajama pants. Jim saw Mike's right foot fly past him as he stepped into the pant leg. He soon started to rise, reaching his son's waist line. Jim held on tightly as Mike's thumb entered the inner lining of his boxers as he adjusted himself. He was sliding side to side along the inside of the waistband. Jim couldn't help but look down. He saw it, the smooth, now cruise liner sized, penis of his young son as a small amount of light filtered the entire front side of his sons boxers. Swaying slightly back and forth to his movements. He glanced up, seeing his son's face looking down to what seemed to be him. Only to see a blank look on his face. Jim slipped, loosing his grip he fell into the abyss of his son's boxers.
151.title: The boys get home (unaware)

choices: Brad heads back downstairs
Brad heads to Mike's room
152.content:
Brad walked into the house. The 20-year-old had moved out a few months ago, but he still stopped by to visit with his brothers on a fairly regular basis.

He came into the house, despite seeing his dad's truck parked in front of the house.

Brad and his dad hadn't really gotten along in years. In many ways, they were far too alike, which made the entire situation even more fraught with tension.

Brad stood a couple of inches taller than his father, and he also possessed an incredible body. A natural athlete, he took great pride in his appearance. He had close-cropped blond hair, green eyes and a tremendously toned body.

Strangely, Brad found the house strangely empty. He checked the living room and the kitchen.

"Dad?" Brad called out. "Hey, anybody home?"

Brad, finding himself alone, headed toward the second floor of the house.

•••••

Tiny Jim, still on the floor in Mike's bedroom, heard the rumbling shouts from his oldest son.

"Brad!" Jim exclaimed. "I've got to get him to see me."

Jim sprinted across the floor, abandoning the shrinking device beneath Mike's bed. By this point, he heard — and felt — vibrations from the hallway. Brad's huge footsteps!

Jim lingered in the doorway as he saw his immense son strolling the hallway, coming toward Mike's room. He stared in awe at Brad's colossal body and then dropped his gaze to Brad's enormous sneakers.

•••••

Brad poked his head into a room across the hall from Mike's bedroom. "Tommy?" Brad called out.

He scratched his chin, wondering at the absence of all his family members, completely unaware of his shrunken father's ongoing attempts to attract his attention.
152.title: Brad

choices: Brad decides to test his fathers limits
One of the other boys comes home, they share dad
1522.content:
Brad headed to Mikes room.

Jim heard someone coming. He waited to see who it was. The shadow of his huge oldest son came into view.

JIm began to jimp up and down "BRAD HELP, HELP ME ! IM down here."

At first he saw nothing when he peaked inot the room to see his younger brother. Then jsut begore backing his heard out of the doorway saw something on the bed moving.

He went in for a closser look.

At first he thought it was a bug, looking for something to crush it with he looked down deciding to use his own flip flop. HE slipped it off this foot, raised it high over head then as he descended upon the intruder heard. "NNNOOOOOO"

He stopped just as the thin rubber sole was about to squash his father.

"WHAT THE......?" He said dropping to his knees and leaning in for a closer look.

Jim hand crouched down and brought his hands over his head to try to deflect the blow, not that would ahve done anything at his size.

When he realized he was not crushed, he eased up and exhaled looking up to see why he was not splatted.

There above him was the huge face of his oldest son.

"Brad, Its me. Dad. You have to help me."

"Dad? what happened to you?" Brad questioned.

Jim motioned over to the device that shrank him.

Brad picked it up. "This ? This shrank you?"

Jim explained the story up to that point. Brad laughted.

"Well well well, I always thought you needed to be cut down to size. Now ya did it to yourself. HAHAHA"
Brad scoffed.

"NOT FUNNY" Jim scolded.

"Like your in any position to talk to me that way?" he said flicking his father over with his finger. Then he stood up with the device in his hand. As he sat down on the bed, his hige ass loomed over Jim. Lowering himself to the bed Jim ran jsut in time to avoid being sat on. Now however he found himself between his sons huge thighs and pressed against his massive bulge.

"So lets see. Theres the size settings here and what's this one ? Pliability? I wonder what that does" he wondered.

Picking his father up from the bed and setting him on the floor he looked down at his tiny father. He then pointed the light at him and shot the device again.

Jim screamed. When the light stopped, nothing seamed to be different.

"Must be broken" he said reaching down for this father. This time however as he appled pressure with his fingers his father squished like a sponge.

Both Jim and Brads eyes widdened. Unhurt from the squeeze, brad eased up on the pressure. Jim body returned to normal.

Brad commented, "This is awesome"

Jim said "This is BAD!"
1522.title: Brad pays a visit

choices: Goes to find his Brothers
Goes and finds some of HIS Buddies
15221.content:
Brad decided to carry his dad downstairs but stopped by the bathroom first. He opened the medicine chest and grabbed a roll of sports tape. Then bounding down stairs he sat at the kitchen table.

"Brad, you have to stop this" his dad pleeded. "Please
take me back upstairs and change me back"

"You talk too much" Brad said. Taking his thumb and index finger then squeezing his fathers head in an effort to stop his chattering.

Brad then took the sports tape and positioned his fathers arms to his sides and wrapped some tape around his upper body. He did the same to his ankles. His fathers head regained its shape and Jim looked worried at the prediciment he was in.

Brad leaned back in his chair and propped his feet up. All Jim could do is look up at the towering long feet on either side of him. It was very intimidating to see his son wiggling his toes over him like that. Brad wears a size 14 shoe.

Satisified with the little taunt he just gave his father, he put his feet back on the floor. "Think I'll go see if I can find Trevor, Mike and Tommy" he said.
"They are gonna love seeing you like this. Wanna come along ?" he chuckled. "Not that you have a choice"


Slipping off one of his flip-flops he set it on the table.

"What are you doing?" Jim demanded to know.

"Just making sure I dont loose ya" Brad said as he placed Jim right in the middle of the foot bed. Jim could smell the rubber and sweaty it had absorbed from Brads foot.

He struggled the best he could as his son ripped off some pieces of the tape again and began securing his dad to the rubber sole.

Brad then placed the flip-flop on the floor. He stood up and looked down. His father looked soooo small down there. Helpless. HE LOVED IT ! "Well Im off to find the guys" he said and slowly begain slipping on his flip-flop. With his foot in position over his father he then slowly begins to press down. He feels the sole of his foot touching his father, then slowly begins to add more pressure.

Jim screamed in protest but then the sound is extinguished as he is squished.

Brad then.....
15221.title: Under Brad

choices: Wrestling practice
The library
152211.content:
Brad drove around town for a little while, enjoying his living massaging insole. Then he parked the car by a fast-food place and addressed his little captive.

"How're we doing down there, Pops?" he asked. In his present state, Jim couldn't answer, merely contort his features into an expression of anger. Brad barely noticed.

"Where do you think everyone is?" he asked again. To Jim's surprise, Brad lifted his foot off the flip-flop. His dad eventually reformed with a pop and immediately began to run. He didn't even make it below the seat before he was hit with a swift kick. Jim flew, hitting the gas petal, and splattering around it. He reformed, falling to his knees.

"When I ask you a question I want an answer to," Brad said, eyeing his father. "You can give it to me."

Maybe my other sons will help me, Jim thought. Or I can escape.

"I was supposed to -- "

"Eh? I don't know if you noticed, but you'd pass for a bean."

"I was supposed to pick Tommy up from wrestling practice," Jim yelled. "Mike is doing a project at at the library!"

His head inclined towards his legs, Brad understood. "Alright, thanks. Next stop..."
152211.title: Taking Directions

choices: He's at the park basketball courts
Hes at the local Gym
152212.content:
Brad was so high on the power trip he was having he nearly wet himself. As he walked to his truck he looked down at his feet as they pressed down into the rubber flip-flop. Getting into the truck he realized he was rock hard.

He had to relieve himself.

He reached down and pulled off his shoe. He looked down at his flattened father.

Pulling his swollen, throbbing manhood out of his pants he laid it across the foot bed and over Jim. He started moving it back and forth under him. The rubber nibs made for an incredible feeling. His dad was beginning to regain some shape. By the time he was able to realize what was happening, it was too late. Brad exploded his white ooze all over him. It was like a fire hose.

Jim was mortified being stuck in place and now coated in his sons seed.

“Wow, that was incredible pop.” he said as he laughed at his fathers struggles. “Now off we go” he continued and slipped his foot back into his shoe.

Jim could hear the engine rev and the pressure as Brad stepped on the gas.

Brad must have hit every red light he came across. Jim could feel him moving his foot from gas to brake then back again. Over and over.

It seamed like forever to Jim before Brad parked the car. He took a moment, again just looking down at his feet, adjusting them on the rubber footbed.

Brad opened the truck door and stepped out. Jim could hear voices. He was not sure where he was but he was about to find out.
152212.title: On the Road with Brad

choices: Try to climb his son's wrestling shoe
Try one of the friends' footwear
153.content:
Panicking, although the natural thing to do when finding himself under an inch tall, didn't much help.

When Jim came to his senses, he decided to seek out help. He figured one of his four sons would be home soon.

He reached the hallway after a moderate trek, still feeling overwhelmed by the sheer scale of everything. Jim kept close to the trim along the base of the wall. His gigantic home sounded eerie in its silence.

A silence that was suddenly broken by an unbelievable tumult when three youths stormed through the front door and headed upstairs immediately.

They were led by Jim's 16-year-old son, Tommy, accompanied by his best friends, Josh and Will.

Tommy, who stood about 5’11 and weighed 165 pounds, looked impressive, but his friend, Josh, had the advantage. Already 17 years old, he stood 6'2" and weighed a solid 190 pounds. He wore a pair of old sneakers with frayed laces that dangled toward the floor.

Will, shorter than his two friends, stood about 5'8" tall. He weighed about the same as Tommy. He had shaggy dark hair and wore a pair of flip-flops.

The three teens charged down the hall toward Tommy's room, careening off each other and the walls in their haste.

For tiny Jim, far below the titans on the floor, the trio looked absolutely terrifying, especially after his own son's wrestling shoe crashed down only inches from him at one point.

The guys paused in the hall. "Doesn't look like anyone is home," Tommy said.

"No!" Jim shouted. "I'm here! Down here! On the floor!"

While the titanic trio paused outside Tommy's room, Jim came to a desperate decision.
153.title: They're Home!

choices: Will collects his prize
The guys insist Will join them
1531.content:
Jim waited for the three teen titans to enter Tommy's room. Tommy and his friends sprawled out on his bed and on the floor.

Jim sprinted from the hall into his son's room. He found his son seated on the edge of his bed. Huge Josh sprawled out on the bed. Will, however, had seated himself on the floor.

The boys were busy talking, so Jim decided to make a dash past Will toward Tommy's enormous wrestling shoes.

The tiny man reached the huge shoes without incident. He paused next to one of the frayed laces that dangled to the floor. The frayed cords of fiber looked like ropes to the little man.

Jim began to climb, but halfway through his ascent, Tommy shifted his foot, sending the tiny man falling.

Jim landed with a thud on the floor, the wind knocked out of him.

His fall attracted the attention of Will. The gangly teen kept his interest to himself, however, as he fastened his gaze on the tiny form.

Will's pulse began to race. "It can't be!" The youth thought silently. "But it sure as hell looks like a tiny man!"

Without doing anything to attract attention, Will slid one foot out of its flip-flop. He then stretched out his foot and flexed his long toes as he brought the foot closer to the tiny prone man.

••••••

Jim rested long enough to recover from his fall. He meant to attempt the climb again when he saw Will's approaching foot.

"No!" Jim screamed as he saw a huge toe descending toward him.

The enormous digit pressed down heavily on the tiny man and muffled his frantic screams.

••••••

Will felt the feeble struggles beneath his toe, but he dared not lift his foot in the slightest to alert his friends. He wanted this prize all for himself. He pretended to listen to Tommy and Josh, but his mind raced to thoughts of what he could do with a tiny man.

At the same time, he noticed, the struggles began to weaken and, eventually, ceased.

••••••

"Let's get something to eat," Josh suggested.

"Sounds good," Tommy agreed.

As his two friends started to leave, Will told them he would join them in a moment.
1531.title: Noticed, Unfortunately

choices: Jim climbs out of the pocket
Will heads for home
15311.content:
Jim tried to scream and then simply tried to get fresh air while pinned beneath the gigantic teenager's toe.

"What is he doing?" Jim wondered as he gasped for air. Did the youth mean to crush him like a bug?

Although he tried to fight, he had no strength to prevail. Coupled with the lack of oxygen, the tiny man soon fainted.

•••••

"I'll be along in a few minutes," Will told Tommy and Josh, who went on without him.

Will waited long enough to make certain he was alone.

He lifted his toe off the motionless, prone body of the tiny man. He nudged the tiny figure with a fingertip. "Damn!" Will said in a disappointed tone. "I hope I didn't crush him."

Not knowing how long he would have the privacy to act, Will scooped up the tiny man and plunged him into the pocket on the front of his shirt.

He then went downstairs to make excuses to his pals before he headed home with his discovery.

•••••

When Jim regained consciousness, he found himself trapped in a deep cloth pit. He also heard a rhythmic thumping sound.

"I've not been squished," he celebrated, but then began to feel a chill along his spine. He now realized where he must be. "I'm in his pocket!" Jim exclaimed, remembering his son's giant friend who had nearly crushed him with a single toe.

The thumping noise must be the giant's heartbeat!

He also heard voices, loud but muffled.

"I'm going to head home guys," Will told his buddies.

"See you later, man," Tommy said.

Jim recognized his son's voice. "Tommy," Jim yelled as loudly as he could. "Stop him! Don't let him take me!"
15311.title: Pocketed

choices: Beg Will for help
Try to reason with Will
153112.content:
Jim tries to gain handholds in the fabric of the shirt pocket. He claws his way midway up the pocket only to lose his grip and slide back into the bottom of the pocket.

He must escape. He isn't sure what his son's friend has in mind, but he can't imagine it will be anything good.

Outside the house, feeling a feeble commotion inside his pocket, Will pats the fabric with his hand.

"Settle down in there!" Will ordered.

Shocked at how the simple pat of the giant's hand crushed him between two walls of fabric, a chastened Jim decided not to tempt the giant into a repeat performance.

On his way home, Will's mind raced ahead. He hadn't stopped to ask himself how a tiny man came to be inside Mike's room. All his thoughts focused on what he could do with such a tiny man.

Once he got home, Will went directly to his room, locked the door and plucked his tiny prize from his pocket.

A few seconds later tiny Jim found himself on a desktop staring up at his son's immense friend.
153112.title: Home with Will

choices: "I said no and I mean no!"
"Well, alright then..."
1531121.content:
"Please help me get back to normal!" begged Jim.
"No." replied Will.
"Please, I'm on my hands and knees here!"
1531121.title: On hands and knees...

choices: They  help dad return to normal
Decide to play wtih dad
1532.content:
Jim knew he had to get help no matter how intimidating the teens were at his diminished size. Wondering how he was going to get one or their attention. Tommy and Josh were wearing sneakers and it would be a big climb. Will however was wearing a pair of thin flip flops.

The thought of getting that close to those huge feet was sending chills up his spine but he had to do it. He approached the teens now sitting in various parts of the room. Josh was on the bed, Tommy on the chair by the computer. Will was sitting on the floor with his feet stretched out in front of him.

Will was his best bet for contact.

Jim carefully approached from the side of the bed. Wills foot and leg within reach. Jim slowly crept over. Just as he was about to make contact his touch was interrupted by a clear wall. Josh had seen him on the floor, and grabbing a plastic cup from the bedside trapped the tiny man inside.

The cup was then quickly turned on its side and uprighted. Jim fell to the bottom of the cup. Josh lifted it calling over to Tommy. “Dude, you got some weird bugs crawling around your room. This one almost bit Will”

The three boys looked into the cup to examine their find.

“Dad?”

Jim yelled up to his giant son. “Tommy you have to help me. I shrank myself with that school project and now IM stuck like this.”

An evil grin came across the boys faces as they looked at one another. “Cool” they said.

Jims heart sank. This could not be good.
1532.title: Contact

choices: In the mayhem, Tommy is shrunk
In the mayhem, Will and Josh are shrunk
15321.content:
Tommy took the cup in hand and looked down at his miniscule father. "Dad?" he said, again.

"It's me, son!" yelled Jim, jumping up and down waving his hands to get attemtion. Jim was about half an inch tall, meaning that his son Tommy was about 870 feet tall. Will was a bit shorter, while Tommy's best friend Josh was even more enormous, nearly 900 feet tall. Jim had never had toruble disciplining his kids, but he was so ashamed now. His sixteen year old son and his friends seemed like titans. "Please help!"

"Don't worry," he said, "I will." He hadn't been able to understand his father, but he knew what his panicky motions meant. "We'll restore you." Tommy turned his head, so neither his father nor his friends saw the glint in his eye.

After an intense game of Charades, Tommy had gotten the gist of what had transpired. Jim had shrunken himself using the shrink ray. He stared at it now, unbelieving.

"Looks like a toy," commented Josh.

"Your dad *and* the gun," said Will.

"Hey," Tommy said, "He's still my dad, alright?"

"Whatever," said both of the friends.

Tommy would get his revenge, though, he had planned it. He picked up the shrink gun. "Ready, guys?" he asked his friends. They nodded from where they had been standing in the doorway and they walked past the mirror; Josh set Tommy's dad on the table. Jim gasped for breath; Josh didn't realize how much his tree-trunk fingers had been crushing him. The power was intoxicating.

"1..2..3!"

At the last minute, Tommy moved, pointing the gun at his friends.

"Whoa, man, easy there!" Will said, startled, but as he did, Josh dived through the air just as Tommy pulled the trigger. Josh slammed into his knees, the gun went flying, Will leapt to try to avoid the beam.
15321.title: Scuffle

choices: He's going to enjoy his newfound power
He ignores the shrunken individuals
153212.content:
Even as their bodies hit the floor, all three teens stayed completely silent, knowing sounds were futile if the beam of the shrink ray touched them. Tommy's knees had been taken out by Josh, they both fell onto the floor. Will, seeking to get out of the way, had immediately dived backwards. The gun went spinning through the air, striking objects. Having convened in Tommy's room for the (alleged) unshrinking, they now watched a number of Tommy's things become about 1/144 their previous size - knowing some of them were next. But the beam moved too fast. There was no escape.

Tommy's cell phone on the nightstand shrunk out of sight as the beam surrounded it; a pile of dirty laundry in the corner became doll-size; a school textbook disappeared. Then, bouncing off the mirror on the dresser, the beam slammed into the heap that was Tommy and Josh. One of them became microscopic instantly. The beam then jumped again, flying acros the room, where it struck Will. Then it cluttered uselessly to the floor. After shrinking numerous objects (and people), its battery had died.

* * *

Tommy felt something whoosh right by him, but with his eyes clamped shut, he didn't know if it has touched him or not. He was afraid to find out. He did not want to open his eyes and find himself staring at a friend's toe. When there were no giant footsteps, however, he let one eye peek.

He was alone.

"Oh my God," he said suddenly, looking down at the carpet under him. A tiny figure was dancing around frnatically. Next to him, another one. Josh. Will.

Slowly, a smile spread to the edges of Tommy's face. His father, sitting on the table dumbfounded, and his two best friends were now barely half an inch tall, begging at his feet.
153212.title: Luck! - For Tommy, that is.

choices: Will and Tommy want a turn with the little man
Josh isn't done yet
15322.content:
While the other two snickered at the little man's shrunken situation, Josh wanted to bully the pint sized adult around some.

Looking down into the glass, he sneered pompously, "So tell me, how's it feel to be so shrimpy?"

From Jim's perspective, Josh's voice sounded as if it came from a god and was made even worse as the words echoed off his glass prison's wall. As he held his ears to muffle the thunderous sound, the three teens laughed contemptiously.

After waiting a second or two, Josh glowered at Jim and shook the glass. "I asked you a question bug man? How's it feel being the size of a bug?"

Despite the embarrasment, the miniature adult admitted, "It's scary...I mean you guys are so huge."

The three 'giants' nodded at each other proudly upon hearing this.

"So you think we're big do ya? Well whatchya think of this?"

Tilting the glass so that Jim had no choise but to slide out, Josh dropped the mini adult onto his bicep and flexed it. Compared to Jim, the gargantuan muscle seemed to be as massive as a bulldozer.

Josh, in the meantime, was having the time of his life. He had always dreamed of being able to push around an adult, and now he had his chance...
15322.title: Josh's toy

choices: Follow Tommy and Jim's perspective...
Follow Josh and Will's perspective...
153221.content:
"Hey man, let me have him," Will said, reaching for the little man struggling to stay on Josh's arm. Tommy shoved Will aside and snatched his dad away from Josh.

"Get out, guys. This is psycho and I don't know what's going on, but I'll call you when I know, all right?"

"That's not fair," said Josh, but had no grounds on which to claim his friend's dad as his own. He and Will were forced to leave, not knowing how to best argue their point.

As Tommy shut the door behind him, he leveled his hand off, allowing his father to climb between his fingers and onto it.

* * *

Jim was less afraid than he had been five minutes ago on that kid's power trip. Still, though, he was nervous. Tommy was acting strange. Would he help him or not?

To his surprise (and Jim was shameful that he hadn't trusted his kids), Tommy was gentle with him and tried his best to make him comfortable. "Now Dad, he said, explain to me again just how you..." Tommy gestured towards his dimunitive form "...got, you know, like this?" He was eager to know.

* * *

Unbeknownst to either Jim or Tommy, Will and Josh planned on sticking around and specifically, getting their hands on that ray gun. They crouched down around bushes in the back yard.
153221.title: Trust in Tommy

choices: They find somewhere private to play with tiny Jim
They decide to have some fun with the shrink ray first
1532212.content:
Still lurking outside in the bushes, Josh and Will were plotting.

“I can’t believe that Tommy freaked out like that,” fumed Josh. “You’d think he’d enjoy being able to order his dad around for a change. If I had a device like that I’d shrink my dad in a flash.”

“Me too,” agreed Will, who was still annoyed at being denied the chance to get his hands on Tommy’s shrunken dad. “And my asshole of a brother.”

Josh grinned. “Having a shrink ray sure would be the coolest thing ever. Just think of all the people we could shrink!”

The next couple of minutes were spent debating who they most wanted to cut down to size. Annoying family members; school rivals; teachers or other so-called “responsible” adults; even a couple of local sports teams: all were added to their list of potential playthings. “The ‘short-list’!” joked Will. However, the two boys quickly returned to the matter at hand.

“There’s no way I’m going to pass up on a chance to get hold of that shrink ray,” vowed Josh. “And Tommy’s dad is gonna be ours too!”

“Yup, I definitely want to have some fun with him,” agreed Will. “He’s yelled at us enough times in the past so I figure it’s time to see how he likes being the one getting ordered about! I think we should keep him as a pet! Maybe we can teach him to perform tricks!”

The two youths began snickering again, but their cruel mirth was cut short by the sound of activity from inside the house. They could hear the muffled sound of Tommy’s voice calling out: “Don’t worry, dad! I’ll be back as soon as I’ve found Brad or Mike. Then we’ll get you back to normal!”

“Get down!” hissed Josh, and the two slipped deeper into the bushes. A moment later the back door opened and Tommy rushed out with a worried expression on his face. Leaving the door to slam behind him he ran past the bushes and disappeared down the street.

After waiting for a moment to be certain he’d gone Will and Josh emerged from their hiding place. Josh tested the back door. It was unlocked. Exchanging a smile, the teenagers crept quietly inside the house and made their way stealthily up the stairs...

******

Jim stood tiny and alone on the vast expanse of Tommy’s desk. Although he’d never admit it to his son, his experience in the hands of Josh had terrified him. Even Tommy himself had seemed overwhelmingly huge and powerful to the minuscule adult, but at least his son had apparently realised this wasn’t a game and made his power-mad friends leave. He and Tommy had then talked and agreed that the best course of action was for Tommy to go and find either Brad or Mike. Although apprehensive at being left on his own at such a tiny size, Jim was also a little relieved because he couldn’t help but feel humiliated and lacking in authority next to a sixteen-year-old boy who could hold him in the palm of his hand. Left with nothing to do until Tommy returned Jim walked hesitantly to the edge of the desk and ventured a glance downwards. The drop to the carpeted floor below must have been hundreds of feet. Nearly overcome by a sudden wave of vertigo, Jim staggered back, resolving to stay far, far away from that terrible abyss.

He was still trying to calm his nerves when he heard the back door creak open, followed a moment later by the sound of somebody coming up the stairs. “Tommy, is that you?” he called, realising the moment he said it that his son would never be able to hear him. Surely Tommy couldn’t have returned so quickly? It only seemed like a couple of minutes since he left. There were footsteps on the landing and the sound of voices. There were two of them and Jim realised with a start that neither of them belonged to any of his sons. The footsteps paused briefly outside Tommy’s room... and then moved on. The tiny man was just sighing with relief when a loud cry of triumph from the direction of Mike’s bedroom made him nearly jump out of his skin.

******

“First thing we need to do is find that shrink ray,” decided Josh as the teenagers reached the top of the stairs. “If Mike built that thing then it’s probably still in his room. Let’s try there first.”

The teenagers invaded Mike’s bedroom and began searching. It didn’t take them long to spot what they were after: the size-changing device was still lying on the floor where it had fallen after the accident.

“Wow, I can’t believe Tommy was dumb enough to leave this behind,” chuckled Josh as he picked it up. “I guess he always was a little slow.”

“Hey, look, it’s got another couple of settings on it. This one says ‘grow’. Maybe we could turn ourselves into giants? That would be pretty cool too.”

“Haha, we’ll definitely have to try that as well! But first I just want to shrink a few people to see how they react!”

******

Jim listened in horror as the boys gloated over the size-changing device. At first he’d been afraid that thieves had broken into the house, but then he’d recognised Josh and Will’s voices. He prayed as hard as he could that Tommy would return soon, preferably with Brad, and stop them before they could run off with the device, leaving him stuck at this size forever. Unfortunately, Josh’s next remark made his blood run cold.

“Great! Now let’s grab his tiny dad and get out of here! Where do you think he is?”

“I dunno, but he can’t have gotten very far at his size!”

The sound of laughter reverberated in the hallway like distant thunder. Then the skyscraper-tall door of Tommy's bedroom slowly opened and Josh and Will swaggered in with broad smiles on their faces.

Trapped and exposed on the seemingly endless wooden plain of Tommy’s desk, Jim was terrified. Tommy’s computer keyboard lay a couple of hundred feet away like a piece of modern architecture: if he could only make it there he might be able to hide underneath it until Will and Josh got bored and left. As the two giant teenagers began to wander round the room, stooping to inspect everything like a pair of curious gods, Jim made up his mind to risk it. He started running towards the safety of the keyboard...

******

“Now, if my dad was a fraction of an inch tall, where would I put him?” wondered Josh.

“Probably in a jar, like a bug!” laughed Will.

The two of them instinctively glanced over at Tommy’s desk where his computer monitor, keyboard and a few tins and boxes were kept. What appeared to be a very tiny man was running desperately towards the keyboard. Will and Josh exchanged a glance. “Too easy!”

Josh lazily reached down and pinched Jim between his thumb and forefinger, lifting him effortlessly into the air and bringing him up close to his face for inspection. The two giant teenagers snickered as they watched the teeny adult struggle helplessly between Josh’s fingertips.

“Well, well, well, what do we have here?” sneered Josh. “It looks like some kind of bug.”

“Sure does!” agreed Will. “Maybe you should squash it. You know how much Tommy’s dad hates bugs in his house!”

“NO!” yelled Jim as loud as he could. “Please don’t squash me!”

“Awww. Ain’t that cute! The poor little bug doesn’t want to be squashed!” As the room was filled with the teens’ scornful laughter Jim had never been more frightened in his life.

“You know what, Josh?”

“What?”

“I think it would be a real shame to squash a talking bug like that. I think we should keep it.”

“I think you’re right. We can always squash it later if we get bored with it.” Josh’s smile revealed the gleaming perfection of his teeth inside a mouth that could swallow Jim whole.

“Okay, just stay there. I’d better get something to put it in.”

Will ran out of the room. There was a clattering sound and a moment later he returned with small plastic pill bottle that he'd taken from the bathroom cabinet and emptied. “Just put him in here.”

As Josh dangled the tiny adult over the neck of the bottle Jim made one last attempt to reason with the giant boys. “Please don’t take me!” he pleaded. “I’m your friend’s dad, not some toy for you to play with. Please let me stay with my family!”

The giant teenagers thought this was hysterical. Josh stopped laughing long enough to reply: “Nope. You belong to me and Will now. Don’t worry, we’ll take very special care of you!”

Josh opened his fingers, letting Jim fall and land inside the transparent plastic container that Will was holding. Will screwed the top back on and shook the bottle gently, laughing as the tiny man was tossed around inside. Then, with the tiny man beating his fists uselessly against the thick plastic, Will casually shoved the little bottle inside the pocket of his cargo pants.

“Okay, now let’s get out of here before Tommy and the others get back!”

The teenagers ran out of the house, their heads filled with thoughts of what they would do with their new toys.
1532212.title: Follow Josh and Will's perspective...

choices: They order Jim to take his clothes off
They make Jim perform tricks for them
15322121.content:
The two teenagers eventually stopped running a few streets away, to catch their breath, cool down, and take stock of the situation.

Will could still hardly believe that he had his friend’s dad actually in his pocket. It was just so awesome! He’d wanted to grab Jim for himself ever since he’d watched the tiny single father struggle helplessly between Josh’s thumb and forefinger, completely in the teenager’s power.

And then there was the incredible buzz he’d got from seeing the shrunken adult’s terrified reaction when he’d jokingly suggested crushing him. That had been so intense; for a moment Will had thought the tiny man might even burst into tears! And to think this was his friend’s dad!—the same guy that he, Josh and Tommy had looked up to all these years... How the tables had turned! Will couldn’t wait to actually pick up and hold the teeny adult himself and have the former authority figure literally in the palm of his hand, utterly at his mercy.

He didn’t understand exactly why, but even though he was now too old to play with toys there was something about seeing Jim so small that made Will want to have him as a plaything. To do stuff to him, even though he wasn’t quite sure what that “stuff” might be. He wished he could have the tiny man to himself, but Josh was his best friend and they shared pretty much everything. From the way he had previously acted Will was pretty certain the Josh felt the same way; both teenagers were now too wrapped up in their burgeoning power fantasies to consider the implications of their actions.

And so when Josh, half-panting, half-laughing, asked what they should do first, Will quickly jumped in with his answer. He patted the bulge in his pocket that marked the location of the pill bottle with its tiny prisoner and chuckled: “I want to play with him first. He’s told me off sooo many times. Now it’s payback time!”

Josh smiled indulgently at his friend’s enthusiasm. In truth he was just as eager to humiliate the tiny male in any way he could. Having a shrunken dude so completely in their power like this was way too good an opportunity to pass up.

“Okay, let’s go back to my place. There’s nobody there right now—not that it would matter anyway, I guess.” He patted the shrink ray meaningfully.

“Cool. ‘Cos we don’t want any interruptions, if you know what I mean.” The two teenagers exchanged a look. They were completely on the same wavelength. “C’mon, let’s go!”

******

Brad and Tommy were arguing as they arrived back home. This wasn’t exactly new, but Brad had been incredulous to say the least when his younger brother had unexpectedly turned up, flushed and barely coherent, with some ludicrous tale about their dad shrinking himself. Tommy was known for being fanciful, but this was weird even by his standards. And then he’d insisted he come home with him to help, virtually dragging him away from his lawn-mowing work—a much-needed source of income for him.

Tommy himself was no less frustrated. His initial goal had been to find Mike, who would have understood immediately and probably known how to grow their dad back to normal size. But Mike—of course—was nowhere to be found. So that left Brad... Tommy had had to do some fancy talking to convince his older brother to accompany him, but hopefully he might have at least some idea what to do with their micro-sized dad.

As they reached the front door Tommy held up his hand to interrupt his brother. “Wait a moment, I’m sure I closed this...” And indeed, the door was slightly ajar.

Brad rolled his eyes. “Could you be any more irresponsible?”

“It’s not my fault! I needed to find you and Mike! Just forget the freaking door and come on!”

As the two brothers pounded up the stairs Tommy could feel a sense of uneasiness starting to grow. “It’s okay dad, I’m back!” he called out. “I found Brad and we’ll see if we can grow you back!” He led his brother into his bedroom and scanned the desktop where he’d left Jim. “Dad? It’s okay, you can come out. It’s just the two of us. Dad?!”

As Tommy’s cries became increasingly anxious Brad folded his arms, shook his head and sighed. “Okay, that’s enough. You always did take your jokes too far. You do realise I’ve probably lost that guy as a client now? Really appreciate that.”

“But he DID shrink! I’m telling the truth Brad!”

“Yeah. Sure you are. In your head.”

Tommy glared at him. “I can prove it. Mike’s shrink ray should still be in his room. I’ll show you.”

Against his better judgement Brad followed his younger brother into Mike’s typically messy lair, standing in the doorway while Tommy began to poke around. Unfortunately, messy or not, it was soon obvious to the horrified Tommy that the shrink ray was not where it was supposed to be. As the younger teen’s searching became increasingly desperate Brad made no secret of his disgust.

“Hey, maybe the ‘shrink ray’ shrunk! Along with your brain. Oh wait, you never had one of those to start with.”

The younger teen’s voice took on a whine as he responded: “I don’t understand, it should be here, I swear it.”

But by now Brad had seen enough. “Okay, I’m done. I’ll be talking about this with dad when I see him. Maybe he can convince you to grow up. Oh, and you can pay for the work I lost this afternoon out of your allowance.”

Tommy looked at his older brother in horror. “Brad, noooo, don’t go! I really am telling the truth, I swear it!”

Brad gave his sibling one last look of contempt and walked away, shaking his head. A moment later the front door slammed behind him, leaving Tommy alone in the bedroom with his head buried despairingly in his hands. The 16-year-old just couldn’t understand what had happened. Could dad have regained his size somehow? It didn’t seem likely, but it was just as implausible that he and the shrink ray should vanish completely.

As he took one last look around Mike’s room a silvery glint caught his eye. Tommy bent down for a closer look and discovered what appear to be a torn scrap of gum wrapper. Tommy frowned. That was weird: none of the family ever chewed gum. In fact the only people Tommy knew who did were... Josh and Will?! But they’ve never been in Mikey’s room... have they..?

A terrible suspicion began to grow in Tommy’s mind as he collated the evidence. A scrap of wrapper that might conceivably have fallen out of a pocket if somebody was carelessly shoving something into it... the back door that had somehow been left ajar, even though he was sure he’d closed it... Josh and Will’s all-too-obvious interest in his dad’s condition, along with their annoyance at being told to leave... the fact that the shrink ray and, more importantly, his dad had vanished completely from an “empty” house...

A chill ran down Tommy’s spine as he contemplated the possibility of his irresponsible friends with a shrink ray in their possession. And his dad as their tiny plaything...

Once more, Tommy charged out of the house, yelling as he ran as fast as he could. “Brad!! Waaaaait!”

******

As predicted, Josh’s house was unoccupied, but the two teenagers nevertheless went straight up to his room and closed the door behind them. The smirk on Josh’s face was predatory as he indicated the bulge in Will’s pocket. “Okay, take him out and let’s have a proper look at him!”

For his part, Will could feel himself shaking with excitement. This was the moment he had been waiting for! He took the pill bottle out of his pocket, gloating momentarily at the sight of the tiny man imprisoned within, like an insect in a jar. Then he removed the cap and shook the container gently over his hand. A second later Jim slid out and landed with a plop in the middle of Will’s palm. “Oh my god, he’s just so tiny!” the teenager gasped, “and he weighs like nothing at all!”

Completely caught up in the moment, Will reached out with the tip of his index finger and poked Jim with it, instantly knocking the tiny man over. Both teenagers laughed, and Will followed this up by placing his fingertip gently on top of the miniaturized adult male and rolling him slowly around his palm. He could actually feel the faint sensation of the tiny single father struggling and beating against his finger with unbelievably tiny fists. The faint yells and screams sounded more like squeaks. It was almost like playing with a bug.

“Hold on! Let me get something!” Josh interrupted the game for a moment and rummaged around in his desk. “Got it!” He held out a magnifying glass, which he positioned directly over the tiny man. The two teenage boys gazed down at Jim with huge grins on their faces, studying him with the magnifying glass.

Sprawled on his back in Will’s palm, panting and sweating from his rough treatment, the shrunken Jim could only look up at his captors, their greedy eyes terrifyingly magnified by the lens. He couldn’t believe that these two titanic gods were his son’s friends, the teenagers that he’d all-too-frequently needed to tell-off. The “ground” shook beneath him as the two colossi quaked with thunderous laughter.

“Wow, he’s just so pathetic isn’t he?” beamed Will. “We could do anything at all to him!”

“Yup!” agreed Josh, hefting the size-changing device. "And looks like we could shrink or enlarge him to make sure he's always exactly the size we want him.“ The two teens exchanged another look, already considering the possibilities of both options. "We could even try out that other setting, 'flux', just to see what it does!"

"But right now I’ve got a couple of ideas.” He leaned in close and whispered something in Will’s ear, keeping one teasing eye on the tiny man in his friend’s hand. Will’s eyes widened as he listened to Josh’s plan.

1532222.title: Other

choices: They learn the device is broken
Trevor goes to his room with his tiny dad
154.content:
Trevor, the youngest brother in the family, never passed up an opportunity.

Arriving home from school, finding the house empty, the boy decided to invade his brother Mike's room.

The older brothers — 13-year-old Mike, 16-year-old Tommy and 20-year-old Brad — never had much time for the eight-year-old kid. Their age differences simply represented a gulf too difficult to cross.

Trevor knew he would get into trouble if Mike caught him, but he didn't care. He knew Mike had locked himself away in his room for the past few weeks. Trevor's curiosity, once sparked, wouldn't cease until he discovered his brother's secret.

The door creaked open and Trevor slipped cautiously into the room.

•••••

From floor level, Trevor's inch-tall dad watched the entrance of his youngest son into the room. Jim found himself very unprepared for the enormity of even his eight-year-old son. Trevor looked like a huge, lumbering giant as the kid tried to move quietly into the room.

"Trevor!" Jim yelled as loudly as he could manage. "Help! I'm down here!"

Trevor moved quickly into the room with a shocking speed that caused Jim to scream in fear.

•••••

Trevor's sharp eyes detected a glint of light beneath the edge of Mike's bed. He hurried across the room and retrieved the odd device on the floor. Could this be Mike's secret?

He saw a tiny, scurrying creature while reaching down to retrieve the device.

With a rapid motion, he shot out his hand and grabbed the tiny creature. He felt it struggling to escape in his fist.

••••••

Jim raced toward the device, knowing this might be his best chance to gain Trevor's attention.

As he got closer, he saw Trevor's hand, looking incredibly large, shoot out toward him with blinding speed. The little man felt huge fingers grab him and then fold around him. He tried to beat against his son's fist. "Trevor! Let me out!" Jim screamed.

••••••

Trevor opened his fist to examine the tiny captive. His mouth opened in amazement as he recognized the little man. "DAD?" Trevor asked in astonishment.

Jim, his legs weak from fright, raised his head and nodded.
154.title: Trevor

choices: Dad's a pet!
Mike's home!
1541.content:
Jim, standing on his youngest son's palm, managed to communicate a quick explanation to Trevor about his drastic size change.

Trevor put his dad on Mike's bed. Jim continued to feel astonishment over his young son's sheer enormous size.

Trevor recovered the shrinking device from beneath Mike's bed. As he lifted the device from the floor, he heard the rattling of loose components inside it.

"Dad, I think it's broken," Trevor said looking down at his father.

Jim felt his hopes sink, but he didn't give up. "You'll have to find Mike," he told Trevor. "Maybe he can fix it."

"What if he can't?" Trevor asked. "If you stay tiny, can I keep you?"

Jim couldn't believe his ears. "I'm your father," he yelled as loudly as he could. "I'm not one of your pets. You can't keep me!"

"Tommy and Mike are bigger than me," Trevor pouted. "They would take you away from me."

"No," Jim said. "Mike invented this. He can fix it."

Trevor shook his head slowly, unconvinced and unwilling to so quickly give up his discovery to his older brothers.

Jim started to move gradually toward the edge of the bed. He could not get Trevor to understand.

Trevor looked down and laughed. "Be careful, dad," he said, scooping the tiny man back into his hand. "You almost fell off the bed."

Jim kicked and squirmed in Trevor's fist.

Trevor knew he should help his father. But, foremost in his mind, he wanted to keep Jim's shrinking a secret, especially from Mike and Tommy.
1541.title: In Trevor's Hands

15411.content:
Among the various cages and containers comprising shelter for Trevor's menagerie, the young boy found an empty glass tank, ready and waiting for a new inhabitant.

He lowered his tiny, protesting father into the enormous tank and then took a few steps back to gaze at him from the other side of the glass panes.

"I'll find some things to make you more convertable," Trevor said.

"Comfortable," Jim screamed up at his son. He then closed his mouth, wondering how correcting his young son's vocabulary helped him in the slightest.

Trevor returned with a ceramic castle like those people sink to the bottom of a fish tank. He sat the ornamental structure on the smooth floor in the center of the tank.

"There's you a home," Trevor said. "Do you need anything else?"

Jim answered quickly. "Trevor, please, listen to me. Go find Mike and tell him what has happened to me."

He looked up and waited for Trevor's response. To his dismay, his son shook his head. "Oh, no! Mike would take you away from me."

Jim ran toward the front pane. He pounded feebly on the glass. "Trevor! You can't keep me in here!"

"I'm going to see my friend Christopher," Trevor said.

Jim stamped his tiny feet. "No! Come back here! Trevor!"

He watched as his son left the room, leaving him trapped in the huge fish tank. He stared through the walls at some of the neighboring cages. He saw an enormous serpent slithering on the floor of the closest cage. The snake produced a shiver along the tiny man's spine.

He saw that Trevor had left clothes lying on this floor and it was his turn to do the laundry so entered the room to collect them. Jim got to his feet and started knocking of the glass wall and shouting. Mikes ears perked up and he looked around swearing his heard someone calling his name.

Trevor easily scooped up his tiny older brother and put him into the empty fish tank with their shrunken dad. Mike struggled, but found himself completely overwhelmed by Trevor's strength. He could not even budge one of his kid brother's stubby fingers.

Trevor, the shrinking device still in his hands, looked through the glass at Jim and Mike. He looked very pleased with himself.
