1541211121.content:
There was the sound of the door downstairs and a voice called out: “Hey! Anybody home?” It was Brad, Jim’s oldest son.

Before Tommy could do more than utter an anguished “Noooooo!” Trevor’s hand closed around him and the miniaturized teenager was thrust deep inside the cavernous folds of the boy’s shorts pocket.

Mike and Jim could only watch in frustration, powerless to intervene, as the boy casually stuffed Tommy in his pocket like some small object or possession, then grabbed the size-changing device and ran out of the room. The tiny father and son exchanged a glance, knowing only too well that Brad was now their only hope of escaping from a life as an 8-year-old’s playthings—let alone eventually returning to normal size. Jim had been especially alarmed at the irresponsible way the boy had treated Tommy. It was almost as though Trevor now regarded the shrunken teenager as just another one of his toys, rather than his own big brother. And it was all too clear that Trevor intended to shrink Brad as well and make him the latest addition to his collection of tiny playthings...

* * * * * *

Trevor bounced happily down the stairs, his mind already racing with thoughts of all the cool things he could do with his miniaturized family. As he made his way into the kitchen to meet Brad he kept the device hidden behind his back...

At 6’2’’, fresh-faced with shaggy dark blond hair, Brad would be considered handsome by any standards. He was currently spending his afternoons doing gardening work to earn some extra cash, and the exercise had helped him maintain a finely-toned body. Not surprisingly he was a great hit with his clients, especially when the weather was at its hottest and he pulled off his top to mow the lawns shirtless.

Currently, however, he was wearing an old white t-shirt smudged with grass-stains. There were also several darker patches, most prominent under the arms, that revealed the extent of the afternoon’s exertions; his hair was likewise slightly damp with sweat. A pair of cut-off jeans, and worn sneakers completed the outfit, revealing bare legs that were lightly-furred with bronze hair. He was just taking a deep swallow from a refreshing glass of ice-cold juice when Trevor appeared.

“Hey there, brat!” called Brad amiably, as his kid brother entered the room. “Have you seen Dad? I need to talk to him about something.” While he generally didn’t act obnoxiously towards his youngest brother in the way that Tommy might, the much larger age difference between Brad and Trevor meant that they had little in common and didn’t spend much time hanging out and talking.

The young man slammed the nearly-empty glass down heavily on the table and sighed with satisfaction. “Man, I really needed that. The guy down the street kept me pushing his mower round that lawn of his for ages. In this heat that’s no joke.” He wiped his brow expressively.

As Brad continued rambling on he became vaguely aware that there was something odd about Trevor’s posture and attitude. He seemed to be hiding something behind his back, but what? Oh well—unwilling to play his kid brother’s juvenile little games he shrugged and turned round to put the juice back in the refrigerator.

As he did so he caught a flicker of movement reflected in the shiny surface of the appliance. Brad had the briefest glimpse of Trevor pulling some kind of device from behind his back and pointing it at him. He wasn’t even sure why, but he instinctively threw himself to one side. There was a flash of light that left Brad blinded for a couple of seconds, and when he recovered his senses he discovered that everything had changed. An earth-shattering thud shook the ground and from somewhere behind and above him a dramatically magnified, yet recognisably childish voice exclaimed, “AWWWWWW!”

* * * * * *

Trevor petulantly stamped his foot and made a noise of frustration. Everything had been going according to plan—until Brad had suddenly moved at the last second. The beam from the shrink ray had struck the fridge instead, reducing it to a useless piece of dollhouse furniture. However, its shiny surface had also deflected some of the light. Now somewhat attenuated, this had still been enough to miniaturize Brad as well—albeit to a lesser extent. It might not be as much as Trevor had originally intended, but his eldest brother had nevertheless been reduced to no bigger than a toy, and perhaps that could still be fun. In fact, Trevor reasoned, it could even be better. At his current diminished scale, Brad now looked more like a highly-detailed version of one of Trevor’s action figures, and with that intriguing thought in mind the boy quickly moved to grab the tiny young man before he could escape.

Brad had only a scant few seconds to take in the scene and realise his predicament before the giant boy strode towards him with one hand outstretched. Frightened, the tiny young man didn’t even stop to wonder how he could have been shrunk; he simply turned and ran. Unfortunately, he had taken less than half-a-dozen steps before something large and heavy slammed into his back. A vice-like grip curled around him, squeezing the breath from his lungs, and he was physically lifted high into the air. As he was brought up to the gigantic face of his own kid brother he realised he was clutched in the boy’s hand! Trevor giggled as he began to play with his new toy...
1541211121.title: Stuff Tommy in his pocket

choices: Brad's bathtime
Somebody else enters and discovers Tommy
15412111211.content:
Brad was appalled to find how completely powerless he was in the 8-year-old’s grasp. Trevor pinched his arms and legs in turn, yanking them this way and that without the slightest effort. It was as though Brad was nothing more than an action figure in the boy’s hand, being arranged in a variety of poses. He tried his hardest to resist or break free but the tiny young man’s toned physique now counted for nothing against the overwhelming might of the boy’s stubby fingers. The problem was that the kid didn’t seem to understand his own strength—or the very real limits of movement for the human arm and leg. It was all Brad could do not to cry out in pain as his limbs were painfully yanked and stretched in the vice-like grip, being taken almost to the brink of dislocation a couple of times. The worst moment came when Trevor pinched his tiny older brother’s head between his thumb and forefinger, giggling as he turned it roughly first from side to side, and then made him nod up and down. The pressure was so intense that Brad felt as though his head was about to pop like a grape or be twisted right off his shoulders! Mercifully the terrifying force eased after a moment and with this temporary respite he yelled as loudly as he could at Trevor:

“I’m your big brother, not one of your toys! Grow me back right now! When Dad finds out what you’ve done he’ll ground you for the rest of your life!”

“You’re not such a big brother now!” replied Trevor smugly. “You can’t tell me what to do any more. Anyway, Dad can’t do anything now. He’s even smaller than you are! You should see him: he’s really teeny!”

Brad went pale beneath his tan, though Trevor was too busy enjoying his game to notice. “What do you mean, ‘He’s really teeny’? What did you do to him!?”

“I didn’t do anything, silly. Mikey built a shrink ray and Dad accidentally made himself super tiny, just like in a cartoon. That’s how I found him. I thought it was pretty awesome seeing him so small, so I left him like that. Then I used the ray to shrink down Mike and Tommy as well! I was planning to make you their size too, but then you moved at the last moment and spoiled things.” Trevor pouted for a moment at the set-back, but then his expression brightened. “Still, I guess maybe it’s not so bad having you a bit bigger. After all, it makes you easier to pick up and play with. You’re just like one of my action figures now! You’re a Brad-doll, and I’ll be able to play with you whenever I want!”

“What the Hell!? You can’t go round shrinking people—especially not your own family! Where have you put them? And just how small are they?”

“But it’s awesome! I get to have even more pets, although I guess Dad and the others look more like bugs now. They’ve even got their own little home in a dish upstairs. Oh, except for Tommy. I forgot. I was punishing him for being naughty when I heard you come in, so I put him in my pocket.

Trevor rummaged in the pocket of his shorts with his other hand and fished out Tommy, proudly holding up the tiny, squirming 16-year-old between his thumb and forefinger so Brad could see him. The miniature teenager was in quite a state. His hair was messed up and he was on the verge of tears. His clothes and face had some kind of sticky brown substance smeared across them that looked suspiciously like melted chocolate. When he caught sight of Brad gripped tightly in Trevor’s other hand he yelled out: “You IDIOT! Why did you let him shrink you? Now we’ll never get back to normal!”

Brad was stunned, not only by the normally cocky Tommy’s near-hysterical condition, but by his utterly minute scale. Small as he himself now was, Tommy was tinier still. Struggling helplessly, and almost buried between the fleshy pads of the 8-year-old’s stubby fingertips, he really did seem more like a fragile, insignificant bug. If Dad and Mike were also that size or even smaller... Brad had a sudden terrifying realisation of just how easy it would be for any of them to be accidentally squashed by Trevor—let alone any other normal-sized person oblivious to their presence. Or maybe NOT so accidentally in the case of Mike or Tommy’s friends, who loved to crush or torture bugs whenever they had the chance. Brad’s blood ran cold at the thought of what might happen if he and his teeny family ever fell into the hands of those brats.

“Wow, what’s he got on him!?” Trevor frowned and peered at the tiny figure. “Oh. I must have left some candy or something in my pocket. I guess it melted”. Without any warning, Trevor casually popped Tommy inside his mouth and began sucking on him like a sweet. “Yup. Definitely candy,” he mumbled indistinctly, his mouth full.

Brad was horrified. He couldn’t believe how casual Trevor was being about all this. The kid didn’t seem to realise the potentially dire consequences of his actions! He could just make out the muffled sound of Tommy yelling in fear as he was helplessly swished around by the 8-year-old’s tongue. Brad was all too aware that the miniaturized teenager was just the right size to be swallowed in a single gulp!

Brad yelled at the boy as forcefully as he could: “Trevor! Your brother’s too small to treat like that! Spit Tommy out before you swallow him!”

Trevor paused for a second to look at Brad in surprise, then he spat the little teenager out into his palm and grinned. “Haha, I guess that would be pretty funny!” Tommy didn’t see the funny side, however. His clothes and skin were now utterly drenched in Trevor’s warm saliva, and from the miniature teenager’s spluttering and retching it was all too obvious that he’d swallowed several mouthfuls of it as well. Despite this, the 8-year-old remained oblivious to Tommy’s fear and disgust.

“Hmm... maybe I’d better put you somewhere safe while I play with Brad.” Trevor’s eye lighted on the almost-empty glass of juice that his eldest brother had left on the table. “I know!”

Trevor held his hand over the glass and tilted his palm. Tommy rolled off his giant brother’s hand with a yell and slid down the side to land with a splash in the residue at the bottom of the glass. It was just the dregs to a normal-sized person, but at barely an inch in height Tommy found himself submerged up to his waist. He shivered in the cold liquid and looked up, but the top of the glass rose over twenty feet above his head. There was no chance of him climbing out.

Satisfied that Tommy wasn’t going anywhere, Trevor turned his attention back to Brad. For the first time he noticed the dirt and stains on the miniaturized young man’s t-shirt. “You were right about needing a shower. You’re all sweaty!” he giggled. Instinctively Trevor brought the little figure up to his nose to sniff, making Brad cringe with horror at the possibility of his head ending up inside the boy’s nostril. The tiny young man did his best to keep his eyes and mouth clamped shut as he felt a slight moisture on his face, praying that he wouldn’t encounter a giant booger... but to his relief he was spared that horror and a moment later he was dangled back in front of Trevor’s face for inspection.

“Yup, you kinda smell, even when you’re tiny,” the boy commented tactlessly, while Brad gaped at him. “But you’re too small to go in the shower now. You’d probably get lost down the drain!” Then Trevor’s face brightened as an idea occurred to him. “I know! I’ll wash you in the bathroom sink instead!”

Before Brad could begin to argue Trevor turned and ran through the door. The helpless Brad was roughly shaken about as the boy charged up the stairs with his tiny older brother clutched tightly in his fist...
15412111211.title: Brad's just a toy in his brother's hand

choices: Brad tries to help them
Brad likes his family this way
1541211122.content:
Brad was a college student at a university about forty-five minutes away. Though he lived there in a dorm, he often came home to visit or eat meals.

"I'M HOME!" came the voice from the front doorway. "HEY, IS ANYONE HOME?" Brad looked around the living room and kitchen and hearing no voices, assumed himself to be correct. Hunting through the fridge, he quickly located some leftover lasagna and warmed it up on a plate. He was about to eat a quick meal before going back to his dorm to study when he heard an odd noise.

The sound came from the bedrooms. Brad was very controlling and protective of his younger brothers and began to worry. Had anyone gotten into the home?

"IS ANYONE HOME?" he called out.

Again, there was no response.

Slowly, Brad began to advance towards where he had heard the noise, still holding his meal.
* * *

Trevor nervously dropped his older (but smaller) brother into the cage, where he landed next to his other brothers and family.

Trevor tried to stay as still as possible. He didn't want to shrink his older brother Brad, who was very paternal (and managing) of him. He would only do it if he had to.

Trevor picked up the shrink ray and quietly stepped towards the closed door of the bedroom, leaning against it. He stumbled on a book on the floor, but hoped the sound had gone unnoticed, and continued to lean on the door, sweating.
* * *

"HELLO?" Brad called out again.

There had been a small sound coming from behind Trevor's door. Brad crept closer to it. Behind it, with his ear to the door, he heard panting. Immediately fearing for his brother, Brad threw his muscular body against the door.

The door burst open to Trevor's surprise, who fell backwards onto the open cage that now contained his brothers and father. He screamed, simultaneously firing the gun as he fell. The beam shot from the end.

Brad was still in an urgent state and having just thrown open the door, was greeted with a blast of light. He reflexively put his hands and arms in front of his face. But the light never reached him. Brad saw, through a corner of his eye, as the light reflected wholly off an outstretched piece of silverware. It struck a figure in the air -- who Brad recognized as his brother Trevor.

Trevor shrunk, landing right in the cage next to his brother's. Right away, Mike leapt onto him, screaming and cursing, as Jim tried to pull the two of them apart.

After successfully untangling them, the three and Tommy turned to see an enormous billboard face staring down at them.

Brad.

"Brad?" Tommy soud, in awe of the huge figure.

"Is that..." Brad was unable to complete his sentence, staring at his miniaturized family in the cage with the top open. He was filled with two emotions: masculinity, as he felt a surge of arrogance at being larger than all of them, a subconscious joy at dominating them, and relief. The people in his life had always sought to protect, though going too far sometimes, were now in danger and only he could help them.

"What...what happened?" Brad asked.
1541211122.title: The Incredible Shrunken Family

choices: Brad retrieves the ray gun
Brad drags his feet in helping them
15412111221.content:
"We were shrunk!" exclaimed unnecessarily.

To this, Brad only smirked. "Really?" he commented, sarcastically. Tommy was the only one to laugh, but he had the attention of all of them with every breath and utterance.

"It was Mike's shrink ray," said Jim.

Brad could understand the mention of his little brother, but the rest were nearly unintelligible squeaks. Something about a pink day?

"I can't hear you," announced Brad, but the aquarium in which his family resided wasn't exactly going to accomodate his head if he stuck it in. "I'm going to take you out, okay?"

He gently lowered his palm into the aquarium. It was a small gesture for him, but for Jim, Tommy, Mike and Trevor, it was like a 300-foot wide platform was coming down. There was, needless to say, plenty of room for them on it.

The family ventured onto it; Jim helping Trevor up the slope of Tommy's skin, and Tommy giving Mike a leg up. When they had all at last reached the center of the palm and stood by the lifeline, it began to lift.

It was a dizzying ride for all those aboard. Brad didn't make a fist, but he curled up his fingers to try to secure the young men. Mike screamed, thinking his older brother was about to crush them like grapes.

When he had transported them all to the living room and allowed them to climb off his hand, one by one, onto the coffee table, he asked again, "What happened?" and lowered his body towards the table.

It seemed, though, more like a mountain was leaning over. They all immediately recoiled.

"I by Mike's ray gun," said Jim loudly.

His son nodded, signifying that he understood them. And then the family launched into an explanation of what had transpired; Trevor sat blushed and embarassed near the end of the table and started to cry as Tommy and Mike angrily recounted how he had shrunk them each to .01% their previous height. They now each ranged between a half-inch tall and three-fourtsh of an inch tall, depending on their respective original heights. To this calculation, Brad smiled, displaying his trailor-sized white teeth. He was about 740 feet tall to these bugs. Mentally, he corrected himself, but he couldn't help feel how insignificant they were and enjoy controlling their every movement.
15412111221.title: Explanations

choices: Move home and care for the shrunken guys
Take his shrunken family back to the dorm
154121112211.content:
"I'll fetch the shrink gun," Brad said as he looked down at his shrunken family on the top of the living room's coffee table. "Don't go anywhere."

Tommy fussed. "Where the hell does he think we're going?"

"Watch your mouth," Jim reminded his 16-year-old son.

"This is all Mike's fault," Trevor said, glaring at his older brother.

"Oh, can it, runt," Mike said. "You're the one went nuts with the shrink ray!"

Indeed, Trevor felt the disappointment more keenly than the rest. He had kept almost his entire family in the palm of his hand, only to have Brad snatch away his triumph with one misfire of the shrink gun.

The siblings threatened to deteriorate into squabbling again until Brad's returning steps sent vibrations through the coffee table. They all watched in silent awe as their huge son and brother approached.

"I'm sorry, dad," Brad said as he knelt in front of the coffee table. He placed three separate pieces of Mike's science project on the table.

"Hey, is it supposed to look like that?" Tommy asked Mike.

Mike looked aghast and Jim shook his head. "What happened?" The father asked his titanic 20-year-old son.

"I think it broke when Trevor dropped it."

"Well, I guess that settles one thing," Brad announced. "I've decided to..."
154121112211.title: A Little Problem

choices: "Not really"
"A little bit"
1541211122111.content:
"I don't know how long it'll take it fix this," said Brad, "but I can't just leave you here. I'll have to move home and take care of you guys for a little while."

* * *

Brad made the necessary phone calls, impersonating his father as he informed his workplace that he was taking a leave of absence due to a family emergency. Jim had worked at the landscape service for many years and they were understanding and caring, though Brad had neglected to say what exactly was wrong. He also called Tommy, Mike, and Trevor's schools and told them a relative had died, and they wouldn't return to school for a few weeks. That seemed strange for one relative, but the school was cooperative. Tommy, Mike and Trevor were good kids.

He wasn't sure why he had said a few weeks, but he felt like pulling his brothers out of school entirely would have been suspicious. And how long would it take to fix them? He didn't even know. After a week, at least, they might know what to do.

Brad also rearranged his course schedule, putting all his classes close together in a six hour block. Every morning, he would commute forty-five minutes, go to classes, go to sports practices, and then commute home. In the evening, there was less traffic, and he could generally make it in around a half-hour. He didn't cancel his dorm, however, because he was hoping this was just an episode that would fix itself.

That night, Brad made his family dinner (he was slightly humiliated for them; they all ate the food right off his plate). Things were awkward: Brad did his homework while his family just sat on the family room coffee table where he'd placed them, watching the super colossal TV. They went to bed around 10 p.m., and Brad realized as he laid in Jim's master bedroom, this was the earliest he had gone to bed in a very long time.

"Don't worry," he said softly to his father and brothers on the night table. Brad had laid out one of Tommy's sweatshirts for them to sleep on; each of them had an individual one of Tommy's socks to use as a sleeping bag. They were clean, but still had a certain scent about them. Brad decided he would need to make better arrangements.

* * *

Brad walked into the house around 7:30 in the evening. Football had ran late. He cooled off over the course of the drive, but he was still exhausted. Especially because he was also carrying two huge sports bags bursting with all of his clothing and all of the things he would need to live in the home: his personal toiletries, school supplies, etc. And the microphones and doll things.

Brad had also enlisted the help of a friend of his in the Biotech department, who let him have small microphones, the kind they used to monitor insects. Brad had told him it was for an experiment he was doing. They wouldn't magnify their voice to normal proportions, but would make them audible if Brad was close and listened carefully. On the way home, he'd also stopped at a toy store and picked up the smallest doll clothing he could find. He was going to go back tomorrow and see what else he could find.

Aching and dead tired, Brad pulled of his tennis shoes, grabbed a beer from the house (hey, isn't it legal with a parent?) and plopped down on the couch. He stretched his long legs in front of him onto the living room table, reached for the remote, and --

"Oh!" he exclaimed. Staring at a spot on the black coffee table about six inches next to his socked feet were a brightly-clothed group of people. "Sorry, I forgot that I put you guys here." At the edge of the coffee table were a bottle cap filled with water and a small amount of food and the pieces of the ray gun with makeshift equipment; he hadn't noticed them being there earlier.

Brad got off the couch, nearly decimating his family with his feet, but not noticing, and retrieved the microphones. He passed them out to his family, who immediately put them on.

"Hey guys," he said sheepishly, as he made himself comfortable on the cough again, though putting his feet farther away from his family. It might not have been polite, but he was worn out, he reasoned. He cared about his family, but he found it odd how little he considered their feelings. He thought it was nice enough of him to move home and take care of them, anyway.

"Have you had any progress with the gun?"
1541211122111.title: Moving Home

choices: They would have to indulge Brad's every whim
Work around Brad's indifference to their plight
15412111221111.content:
"Have you had any progress with the gun?" Brad said, clearly seeing that the ray gun remained in three separate pieces.

Jim, taking advantage of the new microphones, approached his son in a hesitant manner.

"Brad, I have been working with Mike, but the fact is we're just too small to make much progress," he said.

Brad yawned. "That's a shame."

Jim bristled, but kept his cool. "Yeah, it is," he said. "Listen, we could use a hand. Mike could talk you through it now that we have the microphones..."

Brad looked down and grinned to reassure his agitated tiny father. "Sure thing," he said. "Just not right now."

His equally small brothers clustered near their dad.

"This is not cool!" Tommy shouted defiantly. "They'll never get the device fixed if you don't get off your lazy ass and help."

The brothers all looked as if they agreed, but Jim looked like he wished Tommy wouldn't antagonize Brad. Everything depended on keeping him in a good humor.

Without advance warning, Brad lifted his massive feet off the coffee table and then stood. He loomed over his shrunken family.

"You guys better learn to appreciate that I am willing to keep an eye on you," Brad said. "I am going to my room."

"What about dinner?" Mike whined.

Brad ignored the last comment, pretending he hadn't heard. He began to wonder if equipping his family with the microphones had been such a smart idea. Now they could subject him to every little complaint at any time.

"Dinner's in the bottle cap," Brad reminded them. "Enjoy."

They watched in dismay and awe as the giant college student strode quickly from the room.

Jim chastised Tommy for arguing with his giant brother.

He told Tommy and his other sons that....
15412111221111.title: No progress

choices: Brad's crosstrainer
The shot glass
1541211122112.content:
"I don't how we're going to reverse this...but I'm gonna take you guys back to the dorm."

Instantly, all of the guys erupted into protests. None of them wanted to be in an unfamiliar setting surrounded by giants.

"Brad, what about your roommate?" Jim asked, trying to find grounds on which to make Brad change his mind. "That wouldn't be safe."

"My roommate is studying abroad for the rest of the semester, remember?" Brad said.

"At least," Tommy muttered, "he's not in a fraternity."

"I don't know it's such a good idea, Brad," said Jim, trying to speak loudly and retain the influence he did as a full-sized father.

"What, are you worried I won't take care of you guys?" His laughter boomed in the ears of his tiny family. "Don't worry about a thing."

"Brad," Mike said, "We know you have class, but we have to go to school too."

"You're in middle school," he responded, "you should be happy to miss a few days! I'll call them and act like Dad. We'll say a relative died, you have to miss a few days. Same for you guys, Trevor, Tommy."

Jim worked for a manufacturing company downtown in a marketing and development role and often worked from home. There would be no question or comment if he didn't come to work.

"Maybe Mike can fix the shrink ray while you go to school," said Trevor, eager to be productive and not incur the wrath of his siblings.

"Yeah, sure, I'll just stick it all together," Mike said sarcastically. "I mean, it's just in pieces."

"If you tell me what to do, maybe I can help," suggested Brad.

Still, they were all dismayed.

"Hey, this'll be like before I left for college and we were all living together. Except now, we won't take it for granted, right?"

He tried to do the equivalent of slapping his father on the back by tapping his finger against his back, but Jim stumbled and buckled; Tommy grabbed his arm before he actually hit the ground. Jim looked up to yell at Brad, but he was now standing up and holding something in his hand.

"It'll be dangerous for you guys to just sit in my hand while I drive there. This'll be safer and more comfortable."

"You have got to be kidding me," Tommy said.

Brad just beamed.

Option A: Brad wants to use his own crosstrainer to house them; it's warm and cushioned. He's changed into a pair of Tommy's flip-flops.

Option B: Brad has grabbed a signature shot-glass from the kitchen. It'll fit right into the cupholder and stay upright.
1541211122112.title: Dorming Up

choices: They make to the school without incident
Brad interacts with his family while driving
15412111221121.content:
Since being shrunk, Jim had begun to notice things he hadn't seen before. Large cobwebs in the corners of walls, a scrath in the surface of the family room coffee table, the fact Trevor hadn't cleaned his pet cages in weeks. As Brad held up his footwear, Jim noticed things about shoes he'd never seen before. Brad's were fairly new, giant silver structures that, at size 14, were the size of an apartment building. Over 100 feet long and 75 feet tall. Tiny holes towards the front allowed the shoe to breathe. Small bits of dirt were stuck betwen the treads at the bottom. Tiny notches in the shoelaces.

"This'll work fine," Brad said, and sat down at the couch, setting the gigantic running shoe next to them. Next to his family, it was like a mountain. He tried not to smirk at the size difference. It was for their own good, after all.

Mike walked up to it, placing his hand on the rubbery material at the sole of the shoe. A few hours ago, he had been an inch over five feet. Now he was 3/5th of an inch. At his size, there were grooves in the surface that he could fit his fingers in. Those were the places dirt got stuck that nobody could ever get out, he realized. He reached in and pulled out a tiny piece of soil.

"Dad, are you sure this is going to be okay?" Trevor asked.

"Just be quiet, okay Trevor?"

Tommy stayed silent, realizing the situation. Brad had already brought the shoe over. He had already made the decision before they had agreed or disagreed. Did they have that right anymore?

Brad watched them silently. "It's time to go guys. I have a night psychology class. It's a 45 minute drive just to the university."

Jim nodded. He organized his sons into lines, where Brad very gently pinched them between his finger and thumb and lowered them into the cavern. Each one had a similar reaction: fear as the fingers clamped around their torsos, and then disgust as their feet touched the spongey felt-like surface of the shoe. It stunk badly. Brad's sweat had soaked in all over.

Jim was the last one to go in; Brad allowed himself to smile as he picked up his finger in his hand and dropped him, letting him fall an inch before he hit the shoe. "

"Someone likes being in charge," muttered Tommy, as the family cowered inside the shoe.

Without warning, it tipped and they all rolled to the toe of the shoe. Suddenly, Brad's smiling face appeared at the top, partially obscuring the light. "Oops," he said. "Don't worry, it'll go by fast."

Brad gathered things from the house before he left: food from the fridge, some of his clothing that he had left here. He put it all in the back of his car, into a gym bag he kept in the back. He also dropped in two socks and the other shoe, as he had changed into an old pair of Tommy's flip-flops.

He set the shoe housing his family into the passenger's seat as he also got into the car and turned it on. He also switched on the radio. Then Brad began to go to college.
15412111221121.title: There Was A Family That Lived In a Shoe...

choices: Brad decides to go to class
Brad skips class to be with his family
154121112211211.content:
The drive to Brad's dorm back at the university was a uneventful one. Loud music from the radio would have drowned out anything they would have said, and besides, the rancid tennis shoe wasn't the best place for a conversation. The only sound besides a singer's voice and a guitar's strings was coughing, as the small family tried to expel the overpowering scent from their lungs. Every so often, their light would be blocked out for a few seconds as Brad's hand passed overheard, usually adjusting the shoe so it didn't fall.

Jim, Tommy, Mike and Trevor felt the shoe begin to fall as the car came to a stop. It tumbled onto its side and Tommy, the farthest away from the toe, was flung towards the entrance, which overlooked a broad, gray valley of car mats below.

"He's going to fall!" screamed Mike.

Just before the second-oldest brother was ejected by force, the entrance was covered up by a fleshy palm that was only visible for a second before they were in darkness again.

"I'm okay," yelled Tommy to his family at the other end of the shoe.

The cross trainer was up righted and there was a click of a car door opening. The heard Brad grunt as he picked up his gym bag, pushed open the door, and held the shoe. But, held in the eight-year-old boy's palm, brought home with a crushing weight just how small and helpless he had become due to his careless investigation of Mike's science project.

Trevor, at the same time, didn't have much experience in dealing with a father shrunk down to only an inch tall. The boy, acting on his own instinct, took both tiny dad and Mike's invention to his own sanctuary— his bedroom.

Left to his own devices much of the time, the youngest member of the household maintained an exotic menagerie of pets. He kept a snake, a couple of lizards, a frog and a tarantula as well as a large fish tank stocked with an assortment of tropical fish.

Into that zoo of now-gargantuan creatures, Trevor thrust his uneasy father.

••••••

Trevor tilted his palm and watched Jim tumble onto his desktop. From that location, Jim glanced nervously around the room, getting an eye-opening look at the large serpent basking beneath a warming light in its cage. In another cage he saw an enormous spider moving languidly in its environment. Several cages looked, more or less, empty of inhabitants.

He also stared at the huge fish tank located along the wall opposite his son's desk. The fish swimming in its depths looked more akin to sharks and whales.

"Wow!" Trevor spoke in hushed tones of awe. "You're so tiny, dad."

"It was Mike's science project," Jim tried to communicate. "It shrunk me. You've got to help me."

Trevor watched as his father attempted with gestures and unheard words to communicate. "I can't hear you," the confused boy informed his frustrated father.

Jim tried to concentrate his appeal into as few words as possible."MIKE!" Jim shouted. "FIND MIKE!"

With his youthful ears, Trevor did manage, barely, to pick up on the all-important word. "Sure," Trevor said. "I'll go look for him."

Jim leaped up and down. "Don't leave me here!"

Trevor didn't hear, of course, but he did think of the same concern.

"I just need to find a place to keep you..." Trevor said softly.
1542.title: Trevor's Room

choices: Trevor waits for his brothers to come home to see dad
Trevor calls over his little friends.
15421.content:
Trevor carried his dad to a corner of his room. There was a small cage Trevor Pulled forward.

"YOUR NOT PUTTING ME IN THERE !" Jim protested.

"Sure am." Trevor repled tilting his hand and depositing his father inot the cage. He then closed the lid, latched it and put one of his school books on top jsut to make sure there would be no attempt of escape.

"TREVOR LET OE OUT OF HERE !" his father commanded. "YOU CANT KEEP ME IN HERE LIKE OF OF YOUR PETS"

"Looks like I can" he said. walking out of the room and closing the door behind him.
15421.title: Safe keeping

choices: Brad sets a schedule for who gets dad when
They roll dad into a ping pong ball and play
154211.content:
With Dad trapped in the cage with no way to escape. He went down stairs to wait for his brothers to come home to show them their new dad.

Trevors mind raced with all the cool things he could do that to his dad.

No longer an Authority figure at his sise there were no limits to what he and his brothers could do.

It was not long before the others addived home.

First Tommy came home. 16 years old and dying to drive but Dad would ont let him drive alone. Saying he was irresponsible. Tommy was aslo in mid-puberty and his horemones were racing. HE came home and went right his bedroom.

Mike was next. 13 years old and in that know it all stage. He also had authorty issues.

Last was Brad. 20 Years old and a landscaper by day. Stud by night. He was taller then Jim (at Jims normal height) and very handsome. Thing was he was hiding the fact that he was gay. Brad kicked off his dirty work boots by the door and began calling out for Jim.

"Dad ! Daaaad. You home?" noticing the car keys on the counter.

Trevor replied. "He's Home but he cant hear you."

"Why not?"

"Because he's in my room and I ahve the door closed" Trevor answered.

"Whats he doing in there?"

"Probably trying to escape I suppose. Come I'ss show you." Trevor led Brad up the steps to his room.

The door opened and the room seamed to be empty, except for Trevors pets.

"I thought you said Dad was in here."

Then he heard it. A voice. "BRAD, HELP IM IN HERE. GET ME OUT"

Brad followed the sound to the table, removed the book from the top of the cage and looked in.

"Holy Crap, what happened to you?" he asked unlatching the cage and reaching in grabbing his father.

"CAREFUL !" he shouted.

Jim explained the whole story.

"Hey wats going on in here?" the other 2 brothers asked entering the bedroom as well. Brad turned around dangling his father having him pinched between his huge thumb and index finger.

"Its Dad. He shrank himself with your school project. And watch this." he said dropping him to the floor. Jims freefell with a splat to the foor, his legs compressing below him. He stuck with a thud.

"WOW" the boys said in unison.

There he was unable to move and positioned at the feet of his 4 sons. Brad lifted his huge socked foot, still sweaty from the boots he had on and positioned it over Jim and pressed down just ever so slightly so that the smelly sock encased his dad. All 4 boys laughed.

"I wanna turn, NO I do, No me me" they all yellled.

Brad lifted his foot looking down at his humiliated father. This is gonna be soooooo fun.
154211.title: My four sons - And no one to help.

choices: Went for a jog.
Went to the gym.
1542111.content:
Brad turned to everyone, "Look guys, I'll get Dad first for a day, then tomorrow will be Tommy's turn, then Mike's then Trevor's and then mine again."

Jim couldn't believe what he was hearing! Why would his sons do this to him?

With that, Brad taped Jim in his sock so that his head was in the heel and the rest of his body was in the sole.

Brad and the boys snickered. Brad put the sock on. "This feels good," he said. He could feel his tiny father wriggling around under his foot. He put on his shoes and...
1542111.title: Brad sets a schedule for who gets dad when

choices: Brad, 20 year old son
Mike, creator of shrinking device
15422.content:
Trevor swooped his father of his feet and into his large palm. Trevor had an idea.

"I'll keep you in my shrit pocket while I look!" Trevor's deafining voice nearly broke Jim's ear drums.

"Okay son, just don't yell like that!" Jim said dazed.

Trevor placed his dad in his shirt pocket and walked out of his room. He was running fast, too fast. Jim rolled right out of his son's pocket and landed luckily on a random pillow in the hallway.

"Uhh, I need to find that remote to get me back to normal." Jim said.

Jim walked up to the hallway towards Mike's room. Jim was nearly half way there when someone came stomping down the hall. Who was it?
15422.title: Someone In The Hall
